goal.ch: 研討酸雨化學與資料解析
goal.en: To study the preciptation chemistry and to analyze data

outline.ch:
“1. Background review – History and definition
2. Theory – Chemical kinetics and reaction mechanisms
3. Aqueous Chemistry – SO2 chemistry
Formation of acid rain and acidic deposition
4. Observation – Site selection, sampling, and measuring techniques
5. Physical processes – formation of rain drop and cloud droplet Wet scavenging
6. Modeling“
outline.en:
“1. Background review – History and definition
2. Theory – Chemical kinetics and reaction mechanisms
3. Aqueous Chemistry – SO2 chemistry
Formation of acid rain and acidic deposition
4. Observation – Site selection, sampling, and measuring techniques
5. Physical processes – formation of rain drop and cloud droplet Wet scavenging
6. Modeling“

textbook.ch:
“Acid Rain – Deposition to Recovery, Edited by Peter Brimblecombe et al., 2007.
Acid Rain, Edited by J. Rose, 1998.
Atmospheric Chemistry and Physics from Air Pollution to Climate change, J. H. Seinfeld and S. N. Pandis, 1998.“
textbook.en:
“Acid Rain – Deposition to Recovery, Edited by Peter Brimblecombe et al., 2007.
Acid Rain, Edited by J. Rose, 1998.
Atmospheric Chemistry and Physics from Air Pollution to Climate change, J. H. Seinfeld and S. N. Pandis, 1998.“

instructMethod.ch:
講授
研討

個別指導

ch.competencies: 進階數理及專業知識能力
觀測模擬及分析推理能力
電腦及程式語言應用能力
國際視野與語文溝通能力
專業倫理及服務學習之能力

en.competencies: ability in independent thinking and researching
Ability in advanced mathematics and science and proffesional knowledge
Ability in computer and programming application
Ability in international horizons and communication
Ability in professional ethics and  community service and learning

ch: 系所:限大氣科學學系大氣物理碩士班、大氣科學學系大氣物理博士班。
系所:限化學學系碩士班。
en: Department:MSc in Atmospheric Physics、PhD in Atmospheric Physics only.
